abstract: Cyclist John Degenkolb undergoes surgery after he and five teammates are struck by car while training in Spain.
snippet: The Paris-Roubaix winner John Degenkolb had surgery to repair a deep cut on his leg after he and five other Giant-Alpecin teammates were struck by a car while training in Spain.
lead_paragraph: The Paris-Roubaix winner John Degenkolb had surgery to repair a deep cut on his leg after he and five other Giant-Alpecin teammates were struck by a car while training in Spain.
